itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Shaking Fine Lightweight Plumes and Leather Glaze, an ingredient made through Alchemy. It requires the knowledge of Shaking: Skilled.

â€» Shaking: Skilled can be obtained as a challenge reward after achieving Processing Artisan Level 1.

item.name: Fine Lightweight Plume
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Thinning Lightweight Plumes. It requires knowledge of Thinning.

item.name: Leather Glaze
item.desc: A material used to reinforce leather, fur, and feathers through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.
